install.name: Template Changer
install.author: JoomlaGear.com
install.description: The Template Changer module allows changing templates on the fly from the frontend via a drop down selection list. For help or more information on this module visit JoomlaGear.com

param.name: imagewidth
param.label: Image Width:
param.description: Set the width of template preview image. (default 140)

param.name: enablecookie
param.label: Enable Cookie:
param.description: Save frontend template selection in a cookie. (default No)

param.name: enableemail
param.label: Email Enquiry Button:
param.description: Frontend email enquiry button for the active template. (default No)

param.name: emailbuttonpretext
param.label: Email Button Pre-text:
param.description: Email button pre-text for email enquiry.

param.name: emailbuttontext
param.label: Email Button Text:
param.description: Email button text for email enquiry. (max 15 characters)

param.name: emailsubjectpretext
param.label: Email Subject Pre-text:
param.description: Email subject pre-text for email enquiry. The active frontend template name is added to email subject pre-text. (max 100 characters)

param.name: maxnamelength
param.label: Max Name Length:
param.description: Limit the length of displayed template names. (default 20)

param.name: templateselection
param.label: Template Selection:
param.description: Templates to include in the frontend drop down selection list.
